DOC.HEADLINE: SKINHEAD ATTACK FAKED , GERMAN PROSECUTORS SAY
DOC.TEXT: German prosecutors said Friday that a woman who said she had been thrown_out of a streetcar by skinheads after trying to protect an elderly woman had lied . The woman , whose tale stunned Germany and prompted police to put_up a $ 13 # 000 reward for help in finding the skinheads , lied_about the attack because she wanted free medical treatment , the prosecutor ' s office in Potsdam said .
